希望老師能準時下課，課程內容非常充實，但如果中間沒有稍作休息的話會有些無法專注。
希望期末考能多給些時間，三個小時有點不夠。
老師教得很好也很認真，學到很多知識很開心。
老師雖然我們有時候沒開鏡頭，但我們多數人都很認真，謝謝您的教誨。
The mid-term covers too much unrelated content, such as literature short questions. Otherwise, very interesting lesson!
期末考的負擔有點太多了><

Michael encouraged us to think more and give us many opportunities to discuss and ask questions. It’s a class with sufficient inspiration and some pressure to motivate us to learn. And I appreciate Michael’s teaching attitude. Thank you!

The final exam is a bit too hard.
 I think teacher may think about to adjust the coverage of final exam considering students' absorbing capability
想選這堂課的要有心理準備...期末是essay questions，很難寫的那種..
